item.title: TensorFlow Transform
item.description: TensorFlow Transform # ExampleGen splits dataset StatisticsGen calculates statistics per feature SchemaGen infers the types of features ExampleValidator checks for data anomalies Transform performs feature engineering Transform Inputs Data Schema Transform Outputs Transformed Data Transform Graph The result transform graph (tf.Graph) holds all necessary constants and transformations. The same chain of transformations can be easily applied at serving time. Analizers Framework # Analizers:
